ch.usi.dag.disl

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.usi.dag.disl.Reflection

  • public final class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains reflective information about instrumented classes.

      static Reflection.Class getClass(int classloaderTag, java.lang.String className)

    • Method Detail

      • getLoadersOfClass

        public static java.util.List<Reflection.ClassLoader> getLoadersOfClass(java.lang.String className)
        Returns the ClassLoaders where a class with the given name is defined
        Parameters:
        className - the class name to lookup
        Returns:
        the list of loaders

      • getClass

        public static Reflection.Class getClass(int classloaderTag,
                                        java.lang.String className)
        Returns the Class object registered to the classloader corresponding to the given tag and matching the given class name.
        Parameters:
        classloaderTag - the classloader tag of the class
        className - the name of the class
        Returns:
        the Class object representing the class
        Throws:
        Reflection.ClassLoaderException - if the classloader cannot be found
        Reflection.MissingClassException - if the class cannot be found in the given classloader

      • notifyClassLoaded

        public static void notifyClassLoaded(org.objectweb.asm.tree.ClassNode cn,
                                     int thisClassloaderTag,
                                     Reflection.Class[] supertypes)
        Inserts the ClassNode into the corresponding classloader. If the classloader does not exist, create it. After inserting the classnode, inserts also its supertypes in this classloader. (if supertypes is not null)

      • getClassloader

        public static Reflection.ClassLoader getClassloader(int classloaderTag)
        Returns the ClassLoader with the given tag (or null if no classloader with such a tag is found)
        Parameters:
        classloaderTag - the tag
        Returns:
        the ClassLoader corresponding to the given tag

      • systemClassLoader

        public static Reflection.ClassLoader systemClassLoader()
